title: Absolute Chaos in the NBA
description:
Jalen & Jacoby hit every angle on Kevin Durant’s trade request out of Brooklyn. KD wants a deal to Phoenix or Miami, but how do those get done? Where does Ben Simmons fit on the Nets if they lose both Durant and Kyrie Irving? There’s a strong case for the Nets best option being to wait this out and keep both. Nikola Jokic signed the biggest contract in NBA history – do the Nuggets have enough to compete? Bradley Beal got the max, but the guys think he’ll be looking for a trade in 3, 2, 1… PLUS, Jalen reacts to the news of USC and UCLA joining the Big Ten. All that and more.

itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
itunes:subtitle: J&J: Reacting To A Wild Day 1 In NBA Free Agency, KD Wants Out??
